targets.query: SELECT last("startedT") AS "startedT" FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='internal' and $timeFilter group by time($group_time)
SELECT last("minAT") AS "minAT" FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='internal' and $timeFilter  group by time($group_time)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='all' and $timeFilter  group by time($group_time)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='all' and $timeFilter  group by time($group_time)
SELECT sum("countError")/sum("count")*100 as "rate" FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='all'  and $timeFilter
SELECT last("minAT") as "minAT" FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='internal' and $timeFilter  group by time($group_time)
SELECT 100-mean(usage_idle) as usage FROM cpu WHERE $timeFilter and host='telegraf-loadgenerator' group by time($group_time)
SELECT 100-mean(available_percent) as used FROM mem WHERE $timeFilter and host='telegraf-loadgenerator' group by time($group_time)
SELECT sum("countError") as "countError" FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='all' and $timeFilter group by time($group_time)
SELECT max(/$metric$/) FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='$transactions' AND "statut"='all' and $timeFilter group by time($group_time)

SELECT
sum("count") as NumberOfSamples,
last(avg) as Average,
last("pct90.0") as pct90,
last("pct95.0") as pct95, 
last("pct99.0") as pct99,
last(min) as Min,
last(max) as Max,
sum(countError)/sum(count) as Error
FROM "$measurement"
WHERE "statut"='all' and $timeFilter
and transaction !~ /(all|\/)/
GROUP BY "transaction"
SELECT sum(count) as errorCount FROM "$measurement" WHERE "responseMessage" <> '' and transaction !~ /.*(?i)transaction/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY transaction, responseCode, responseMessage
SELECT  last("count")/5 FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' and $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT  last("count")/5 FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' and $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT  last("count")/5 FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' and $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT  last("count")/5 FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' and $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT last("count")/5 FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT max(avg)  FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='all' AND "statut"='all' and $timeFilter  group by time($group_time)
SELECT last("minAT") as active_threads FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='internal' and $timeFilter  group by time($group_time)
SELECT sum("countError") as countError FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction"='all' AND "statut"='all' and $timeFilter  group by time($group_time)
SELECT last("count")/5 as throughput FROM "$measurement" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)

panels.title: Response time vs Active threads vs Throughput vs Error rate

rows.title: Response time vs Active threads vs Error rate

targets.query: SELECT 100-mean(usage_idle) as usage FROM cpu WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY host , time($group_time)
SELECT 100-mean(available_percent) as used FROM mem WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY host, time($group_time)
SELECT 100-mean(usage_idle) as usage FROM cpu WHERE $timeFilter and host='$host' group by time($group_time)
SELECT  100-mean(available_percent) as usage FROM mem WHERE $timeFilter and host='$host' group by time($group_time)

list.name: transactions
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "transaction" where transaction !~ /(internal|all|\/|Dummy)/
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "transaction" WHERE application = '$tag'
